about_the_game:
Experience the story of life on Earth like never before with SHADOWBOX: Mausoleum of Natural History, a virtual, interactive, and free-to-play museum.

Explore exhibits that detail the life, death, anatomy, and ecology of extinct species containing photogrammetric scans of real fossils. Examine fossils up close, and learn how to identify long-lost species in real life. Scan QR codes to read more about the science behind SHADOWBOX. Collect songs and audio logs to listen to as you explore. Run, jump, and climb on the exhibits, if you please!

As of the current version, Beta 1.0, the following exhibits are open to visitors:

  • Martin Formation (Devonian Period)

  • Naco Formation (Carboniferous Period)

  • Coconino Sandstone (Permian Period)

  • Chinle Formation (Triassic Period)

  • Turney Ranch Formation (Cretaceous Period)

  • Moreno Hill Formation (Cretaceous Period)

  • Menefee Formation (Cretaceous Period)

  • The Geological Eras Tour

Your input will help the SHADOWBOX development team create the most accessible, informative, and engaging experience possible. If you have suggestions, feedback, or would like to report a bug, head on over to the Steam forums.
